Package FOHClasses

Class Terminal

java.lang.Object
FOHClasses.Terminal
public class Terminal extends Object
The main class controlling this instance of the front of house system on a machine.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final int
    numOfTables
    The number of tables that the restaurant has made available for booking.

  • Method Details

    • initialise

      public static void initialise()
      Used to initialise the system/terminal/instance of the front of house system.

    • newBooking

      public static boolean newBooking(String customerName, String phoneNumber, int waiterId, long startTimestamp, long endTimestamp, int[] tables, int covers)
      For the UI to invoke to create a fresh booking
      Parameters:
      customerName - The full name of the customer making the booking
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer making the booking
      waiterId - The unique identification number of the waiter assigned
      startTimestamp - The booking's start time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      endTimestamp - The booking's end time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      tables - An array of tableIds to be booked
      covers - The number of covers (guests) to be booked.
      Returns:
      A boolean identifying whether a booking was removed

    • loadBooking

      public static boolean loadBooking(int bookingId, String customerName, String phoneNumber, int waiterId, long startTimestamp, long endTimeStamp, int[] tables, int[] covers)
      For loading bookings from the database
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking being loaded
      customerName - The full name of the customer making the booking
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer making the booking
      waiterId - The unique identification number of the waiter assigned
      startTimestamp - The booking's start time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      endTimeStamp - The booking's end time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      tables - An array of tableIds to be booked
      covers - An array of coverIds associated
      Returns:
      A boolean identifying whether a booking was removed

    • createBooking

      private static Booking createBooking(int bookingId, String customerName, String phoneNumber, int waiterId, long startTimestamp, long endTimeStamp, int[] tables)
      Instantiates new booking objects for local storage and usage
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking object to create
      customerName - The full name of the customer making the booking
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the customer making the booking
      waiterId - The unique identification number of the waiter assigned
      startTimestamp - The booking's start time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      endTimeStamp - The booking's end time in seconds since the UNIX epoch
      tables - An array of tableIds to be booked
      Returns:
      Returns the booking object created

    • deleteBooking

      public static boolean deleteBooking(int bookingId)
      Unbooks a booking
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The id of the booking to be deleted
      Returns:
      A boolean identifying whether a booking was removed

    • checkArrangement

      public static boolean checkArrangement(int tables, int covers)
      Checks if enough tables have been booked for the desired covers.
      Parameters:
      tables - Number of tables requested
      covers - Number of covers requested
      Returns:
      True if enough tables for the number of covers

    • newOrder

      public static void newOrder(int bookingId, int coverId, int[] items, String notes)
      Invoked by the UI to create a new order.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The booking that the order belongs to
      coverId - The cover that made the order
      items - The IDs of the menu items being ordered
      notes - A string containing any notes attached to the order

    • loadOrder

      public static void loadOrder(int orderId, int tableId, int[] items, String notes)
      For loading orders from the database
      Parameters:
      orderId - The ID of the existing order
      tableId - The ID of the table the order belongs to
      items - The IDs of the menu items ordered
      notes - A string containing the notes attached to an order

    • payWholeBill

      public static void payWholeBill(int bookingId, boolean isCash)
      Used to pay all the covers/orders of the booking
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking being paid for
      isCash - Whether the payment is being made in cash

    • paySplitBill

      public static void paySplitBill(int bookingId, boolean isCash)
      Used to split the payment/bill into individual covers
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking being split/paid for individually
      isCash - Whether the payment is being made in cash

    • createBill

      private static void createBill(Booking booking, boolean isCash, ArrayList<Integer> items, boolean applyServiceCharge)
      Creates a bill object and sends data to management for record-keeping
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking object for usage internally
      isCash - Whether the payment was made in cash
      items - An ArrayList of itemIds purchased
      applyServiceCharge - Whether service charge is being applied
